snippet.textDisplay: This track reminded me almost instantly of some of the more somber, melancholy music in the anime yu yu hakusho, especially the first melodic section of it at around 0:35, which for anyone who has heard that show's soundtrack, myself included, knows is a very good thing. Incredible game.

snippet.textDisplay: In the midst of my first playthrough and came across this gorgeous piece of music.  It's up there with the Final Fantasy VII score and Ocarina of Time menu theme.  Love that swanky piano.  This game belongs with the greatest of all-time.  They sure don't make them like used to.
snippet.textOriginal: In the midst of my first playthrough and came across this gorgeous piece of music.  It's up there with the Final Fantasy VII score and Ocarina of Time menu theme.  Love that swanky piano.  This game belongs with the greatest of all-time.  They sure don't make them like used to.

snippet.textDisplay: I'm in the inverted castle right now, just started it and it's my first playthrough alongside with my boyfriend instructing me on what to do at times. I died in the clock tower, because of the men that multiply themselves. Love this soundtrack, but for a long time the game creeped me out and now it doesn't. I hope to beat the game someday, but for now I am taking a break since I get overzealous in Castlevania games when I fight enemies or bosses.

snippet.textDisplay: It´s called atmosphere. Konami themselves said that they were inspired by Super Metroid, and porbably they wanted to create an atmosphere in Castlevania: SOTN that is just as good as the atmosphere in Super Metroid, which they succeded in. Just like Super Metroid does the soundtrack play a big roll in creating an atmosphere. Castlevania: SOTN is truly a masterpiece, no doubt about it. It is as good as now as it was then back on it´s release day. Aged like a fine wine.
snippet.textOriginal: It´s called atmosphere. Konami themselves said that they were inspired by Super Metroid, and porbably they wanted to create an atmosphere in Castlevania: SOTN that is just as good as the atmosphere in Super Metroid, which they succeded in. Just like Super Metroid does the soundtrack play a big roll in creating an atmosphere. Castlevania: SOTN is truly a masterpiece, no doubt about it. It is as good as now as it was then back on it´s release day. Aged like a fine wine.

snippet.textDisplay: I'm replaying the game right now, it's been a while. Still as amazing as ever. There's just something about the soundtrack Yamane composed, live recordings full of reverb, you know you're not playing an ordinary game. All the songs have their own feel and emotion, you gotta love it.

There's just something about the soundtrack Yamane composed, live recordings full of reverb, you know you're not playing an ordinary game. All the songs have their own feel and emotion, you gotta love it.
